item.description:
Speakeasy under 121 presents: The Sweet Little Variety Show! Variety is the spice of life. Stop by 121 Washington Street for a little bit of everything at the Sweet Little Variety Show!

Cost is $5.

I've found very little information about the acts/lineup, I did manage to find what I hope is indicative of the off-the-wall sort of acts that this venue draws in:

TUBA! - Spinning Wheel, from June 29, 2010 show.

Oh Dear, and for those that remember the 80s. TUBA! - Golden Girls.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be there at 7:45 to find myself a drink and figure things out, I'll be near the entrance
item.name: Sweet Little Variety Show @ Local 121
